title: There have always been OP champions
body:
Remember when a jungle {{champion:266}} would jump over a wall and 100-0 you before you hit the ground

Remember when a {{champion:98}} pick meant that you would never ever successfully kill anyone ever

Remember when {{champion:11}} could 100-0 your entire team while being totally untargetable

Remember when people forgot {{champion:25}} exists and thought {{champion:89}} was the most broken champion in the entire game

Remember when {{champion:134}} could miss 3 skillshots and 100-0 you with DFGR

This isn't to say that {{champion:69}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:75}} aren't horrendously OP but my god you act like you've never seen a fotm champion before

And then we have {{champion:32}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:238}} who have just been fundamentally cancerous for years
